Zachari Bankolé (a mụrụ na 12 Ọgọst 1957), nke a maara dịka Isaach ma ọ bụ Isaac de Bankolé, bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Ivorian-French-American.

A mụrụ De Bankolé n'obodo Abidjan, Ivory Coast, nne na nna Yoruba si Benin. Nne na nna nna ya si Naijiria. Ọ kwagara Paris n'afọ 1975 maka afọ ikpeazụ ya na lycée, wee nweta nzere masta na physics na mgbakọ na mwepụ
Mgbe ahụ, ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ ụgbọ elu wee nweta ikikere onye na-anya ụgbọelu onwe ya, tupu ya na onye nduzi French Gérard Vergez ezute ya mere ka ọ banye na Cours Simon, ụlọ akwụkwọ ihe nkiri Paris.

De Bankolé apụtala na ihe karịrị ihe nkiri iri ise, gụnyere Jim Jarmusch's Night on Earth, Ghost Dog: The Way of the Samurai, Coffee and Cigarettes na The Limits of Control Ọ nọ na United States kemgbe afọ 1997. Ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri Machetero, n'ọrụ onye nta akụkọ na-agba onye na-eme mgbanwe na Puerto Rican a tụrụ mkpọrọ ajụjụ ọnụ, ya na ndị otu Ricanstruction nke dị na New York City.
De Bankolé apụtawokwa na Lars von Trier's Manderlay

O gosipụtara Steven Obanno, onye na-eyi ọha egwu, na ihe nkiri James Bond nke afọ 2006 Casino Royale, nakwa  "The Lone Man", onye na-egbu mmadụ na ihe nkiri Jim Jarmusch, The Limits of Control (afọ 2009). N'afọ 2013, ọ pụtara dịka Ayodele Balogun na Andrew Dosunmu's Mother of George, nke gosipụtara n'afọ 2013 Sundance Film Festival ma bụrụ nhọrọ abalị mmechi maka Maryland Film Festival afọ 2013
O nweela ọrụ na Calvary, The Last Witch Hunter, na Black Panther.
De Bankolé na-asụ Yoruba, Bambara, Bekee, French, German nke ọma, ma na-asukwa ụfọdụ Italian. Ọ lụrụ onye egwu Cassandra Wilson site n'afọ 2000 ruo afọ 2003.
